description: Try our easy to follow On-the-go Granola Breakfast Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: On-the-go Granola Breakfast Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the butter and honey in a saucepan and bring to the boil, stirring continuously, until the mixture bubbles. Add the cinnamon, dried fruit, seeds and nuts, then stir and heat for 1 minute. Remove from the heat and add the oats. Stir well, then transfer to the prepared tin and press down well. Bake in a preheated oven, 190°C, Gas Mark 5, for 15 minutes until the top is just beginning to brown.
Leave to cool in the tin, then cut into 9 squares or bars to serve.
